name: Motivus Consulting
description: At Motivus we’ve earned a reputation for providing sales and customer service professionals with the insights they need to dominate in today’s hyper-competitive business climate. Motivus is an experience based sales and customer service training, coaching and consulting firm that is the leader in the integration of sales and service. Based in Singapore, we study the scientific disciplines of social psychology, communication theory, cognitive psychology, social neuroscience, cognitive neuroscience and behavioural economics. We then take the repeatable and predictable principles, which science has proven to create and enable influence, out of the laboratory and academic journals and apply them to selling and serving.

enhanced_description: Motivus Consulting is an experience-based sales and customer service training, coaching, and consulting firm renowned for equipping professionals with insights to excel in competitive markets. Based in Singapore, Motivus uniquely integrates sales and service strategies, grounding its methodologies in scientific disciplines such as social psychology, communication theory, cognitive psychology, social neuroscience, cognitive neuroscience, and behavioural economics. This scientific approach allows them to derive repeatable and predictable principles for influence, selling, and serving. The firm offers both traditional and digital delivery modalities, featuring experienced and expert facilitators, with a strong focus on initiating and sustaining organizational change, building a more diverse and inclusive workforce, and accelerating skill development and learning efficiency.
